description: PNM EVs: Generates physiological noise regressors for fMRI data

cardiac_file.title: Cardiac values file
cardiac_file.description: Input filename for cardiac values (1 or 2 columns: time [phase])

respiratory_file.title: Respiratory values file
respiratory_file.description: Input filename for respiratory phase values (1 or 2 columns: time [phase])

order_cardiac.title: Order of cardiac regressors
order_cardiac.description: Order of basic cardiac regressors (number of Fourier pairs)

order_respiratory.title: Order of respiratory regressors
order_respiratory.description: Order of basic respiratory regressors (number of Fourier pairs)

order_mult_cardiac.title: Order of multiplicative cardiac terms
order_mult_cardiac.description: Order of multiplicative cardiac terms (also need to set --multr)

order_mult_respiratory.title: Order of multiplicative respiratory terms
order_mult_respiratory.description: Order of multiplicative respiratory terms (also need to set --multc)

csf_mask.title: CSF mask image file
csf_mask.description: Filename of CSF mask image (and generate CSF regressor)

rvt_file.title: RVT data file
rvt_file.description: Input filename of RVT data (2 columns: time value)

heartrate_file.title: Heart rate data file
heartrate_file.description: Input filename for heart rate data (2 columns: time value)

rvt_smooth.title: RVT smoothing
rvt_smooth.description: Optional smoothing of RVT regressor (in seconds)

heartrate_smooth.title: Heart rate smoothing
heartrate_smooth.description: Optional smoothing of heart rate regressor (in seconds)

slice_timing_file.title: Slice timing file
slice_timing_file.description: Specify slice timing via an external file
